archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0897
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Treasury Analyst I want the new stack able to provide reporting on all credit card payments (post pay, pre pay, subscription etc) so can reconcile to the DPS report and bank statements

properties.value: The data to be extracted from Comarch to ADW datalake. Not full credit card details are published (tokenized data)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
